project.name: RandomImage
project.description: Build a pseudo Backend API that displays a random image from the internet. Minimum requirement Write a backend in Spring Boot that exposes an API that returns the necessary response. When the base URL is hit by the browser, it should load a truly random image from the Internet. When /:id URL is hit such as '/1', “/2”, “/99”, and so on, it should again load a random image. Advanced requirements The API must store the link of the random image loaded in the database whenever '/:id' is hit so that when ':/id' is hit again, it should load the same random image as previously hit. '/images' should return a list of all images stored in the database in the JSON format. Guide which you can refer for creating the API https://picsum.photos/
